 [/INST] Made in the USA with real Carbon Fiber. This money clip is very sleek and handsome. It is sleek enough to hold 2 credit cards, bills, and cash. The clip will firmly hold everything tight without crushing the cards and cash. It also has a unique look that will distinguish you as someone who is either trendy or a carbon fiber enthusiast. The look is also attractive, but subtle, so you can always look professional in business or even elegant enough for a date. Also, this is a fantastic gift for anyone, especially those people who have everything. This carbon fiber money clip will always remind them of you and the thought you put into their gift. This is perfect for a boss or loved one.
X. L. Carbon Fiber Money Clip is backed by a 5 year warranty against delamination. We use state-of-the-art carbon fiber with an inner metal frame for sturdy durability. The clip also has a strong spring hinge clasp that can withstand the test of time and repeated use.
You're probably wondering what carbon fiber is and what makes it so unique. What we'll tell you might even shock you. Carbon fiber is made from a polymer and carbon fibers. It is then combined using a special adhesive that will not come out when you use it. This fiber has been used in race cars for decades, even for high-end sports cars such as the Audi R8 and Mercedes Benz SLS AMG. Although it is lightweight, it is up to five times stronger than steel and as strong as aluminum. That is why our money clip is so strong, yet lightweight and able to carry the weight of your cash and credit cards without bending or deforming.
For more information about our carbon fiber and carbon fiber products, please visit our website. We also have carbon fiber wallets, purses, sunglasses, and other products that you might be interested in. Please click on our brand name above to see these products and other products we offer.

Triboluminescent carbon fiber is stronger, more durable and more heat resistant than non-triboluminescent carbon fiber. This effect happens because the layers of carbon fiber are glued together by the triboluminescence process. Our carbon fiber is perfect for this. Carbon fiber is a composite material made from a polymer and carbon fibers. The fibers are extremely thin, with a diameter of only 0.003 inches (0.076 mm). Because it is so strong, while very light weight, carbon fiber is used in many aerospace applications.

 [/INST] Every fashion lover needs a little help keeping her things in check. That's why we created our Pik-Me-Up collection. With this adorable little case, you'll never be without your favorite essentials: phone, keys, credit cards and more. Its compact shape and convenient clip-on function allows you to slip it onto your belt or purse, so it's always with you. Not to mention, its many pockets and pouches make organizing your things a breeze. Our Pik-Me-Up collection was designed with our signature Buxton spirit in mind - demure and modern, with a sprinkle of whimsy, of course. With a zest for life and a love for good design, we set out to create a new kind of handbag: one that would follow you wherever you go. And here's what we came up with: a line of bags that are functional, fashionable and, most importantly, comfortable to wear. Our bags are designed to slip over your shoulder and hug your body, so they feel like an old friend. Whether you're heading out for a day with the girls or just popping out for a bit, our Pik-Me-Up collection will be with you every step of the way.

This vintage, hand-crafted sterling silver bookmark is the perfect gift for book lovers!This bookmark features an ornate hand-cast repousse of a heart with a maze for your fingers to weave through, softening your page turning. This piece measures 2&5/8" high and 3/4" wide. It has been oxidized and then polished to bring out the silver's natural luster. This bookmark is also a beautiful jewelry piece, hand-crafted using the centuries-old technique of repousse, where the silver is hand-hammered into the reverse side of a solid blank sheet of metal to form the front of the piece.It has been carefully handcrafted from Sterling Silver, with a 925 stamp indicating its purity. Please note that this handcrafted product may have very slight variations from the photographs, and may be slightly different in color from the picture.Please consider the possibility that the angle of the camera, monitor, lighting and other factors could affect the color of the product.Product Features:Material: Sterling Silver 925Quality: High GradeHand-craftedMade in USA; Hallmarked for authenticitySKU: SI550P-09The Art Nouveau style, popular in the late 1800s and early 1900s, emphasizes flowing lines and curved forms. The style was used for jewelry and decorative objects, and became widely popular in Art and Crafts decoration. Art Nouveau styles were used in the decorative and fine arts and also in architecture.Product Care:Protect your purchase by keeping your jewelry clean and dry, avoiding contact with the acid and the liquid chlorine in swimming pools. We suggest that you store your jewelry in a fabric-lined jewelry box or pouch to prevent scratches, and avoid putting jewelry on a window ledge or next to a heater where extreme heat or sunlight can cause it to become discolored or warp.

The repouss√© artist uses a metal tool to lift the metal and shape it into the desired form, then the artist continues to strike and shape the metal to complete the piece.  [/INST] Believe us when we tell you that this heart bookmark was made just for you, the book lover! This ornate bookmark was cast in sterling silver from an original antique repousse pattern. It was then fashioned to this bookmark and finished by hand with silver polishing and oxidizing. Repousse is an old technique which involves hammering silver from the back to reflect the image on the front of the piece. The technique was popular in the Victorian era as a decorative art.   This piece was inspired by the Arts & Crafts movement of the late 1800s, when artisans were striving for a more hands-on, natural way of working. Though this bookmark is vintage in style and origin, it is made with 925 Sterling silver, so it will last for years of daily use.  This bookmark is approx. 2&5/8" high and 3/4" wide and is stamped 925, indicating its purity. Weight is approximately 9 grams.  Thank you for looking at this unique item!  If you'd like another, we offer bulk purchase discounts; please contact us.   Please note: this item may have minor imperfections from handcrafting.   We have over 35 designs in this vintage repousse style and would appreciate your feedback, so please let us know if you'd like us to list additional listings.   These artistic bookmarks make great gifts for yourself or someone you love.   Note: If you purchase this item between February 1st and August 31st, your shipment will arrive after Christmas due to our Christmas Season rush! Thank you for your understanding!   Note: This item is usually shipped within 1-3 days of purchase, but may take up to 14 days if out of stock.
There is no additional shipping fee with this item for international shipment, although it may take longer to arrive.   See our full selection of vintage inspired art nouveau bookmarks by clicking on the "Silver Insanity" name above.

This bookmark has a heart charms that will remind you of just how much you love to read.  Each bookmark is handcrafted by our artisans and was inspired by the architecture and designs of Art Nouveau. The name "Art Nouveau" is derived from the French word "nouveau," meaning "new." It is characterized by sinuous lines, flowing curves, elaborate ornamentation, and organic motifs. Art Nouveau jewelry featured bold and whiplash curves and angles with flowers and other natural designs and was popularized from 1890 until 1910.

 [/INST] This beautiful heart-shaped Art Nouveau bookmark is hand-crafted from a sheet of sterling silver using repousse and oxidation techniques, Then it is delicately accented with a German silver ball terminal on each side of the heart. This bookmark is an adorable little piece to keep your place in your favorite romance novel.If you were born under the sign of Libra, or your birthstone is Opal, this is the bookmark for you. Libra, the scales of justice, is the astrological sign for balance, harmony and beauty. Both opal and silver are often used to represent the astrological sign of Libra. Heart keychain  measures 2 1/2" high by 1" wide. Chain is 2 1/4" long. Approximate weight is 9 grams. Marked 925.What is Sterling Silver? Sterling silver has been a precious metal of choice for centuries because of its beautiful white brilliance. Unlike gold which has a yellowish tint, silver has a bright white shine that looks beautiful in just about any design. Silver also has a softer more delicate texture than gold, which allows it to be molded and shaped into intricate designs that would be impossible in gold. It is important to note that sterling silver does tarnish over time, but it can be easily polished to regain its original brilliance.What is Repousse? Repousse is an ancient technique for ornamenting metal by hammering from the reverse side. When smooth and polished, the result is a reverse image of the design on the front side of the metal.Repouss√© is derived from the French word repousser, meaning "to push back". The process can be used to create jewelry with intricate designs. Our Art Nouveau bookmarks are a perfect example of this hand craftsmanship. 
Please note, the oxidation on this piece is a living process. As silver naturally wears away, theoxidized finish will begin to wear away as well, enhancing the design and revealing the silver underneath. It is a beautiful process to watch, but you can always re-apply the finish by rubbing a small amount of liquid silver polish on the oxidized areas.

All of our jewelry purchases include a customer care card that includes our warranty. This bookmark will be packaged in a beautiful Silver Insanity gift box to make it the perfect gift.  
Please note, since these bookmarks are handmade, the specific design, size and weight of each bookmark may vary slightly from the photo.  Genuine sterling silver bookmarks are NOT marked 925 because the US customs service does not require stamping foreign-made sterling silver jewelry. Markings such as 925 are commonly stamped on foreign jewelry to comply with US customs regulations that require any foreign jewelry to be marked with their respective hallmark.  
Directions to our customers who wish to determine the purity of their sterling silver bookmarks: In order to determine if your bookmark is sterling silver, you will need a silver testing kit. You can purchase a sterling silver testing kit on Amazon or at your local jewelry store. A sterling silver testing strip is the best way to test sterling silver jewelry. Simply place the strip on the item and rub it gently. The strip will turn black if the item is not sterling silver.

Marked 925.Weighs approx 9 grams.Please remember that the Patina (the glossy surface appearance) on repousse jewelry will continue to develop over time. To maintain the brilliance and patina of silver jewelry it should be stored in an air tight bag when not worn and should be used sparingly. If your piece of jewelry develops a tarnish you can use a mild silver cleaner to remove it by rubbing it on the affected area.Then buff it with a clean cloth to bring it back to its shiny self.Repousse artisans use a variety of tools to press, shape, and style the metal from the inside out. The work is all done by hand without molding or casts. The artisans work from the inside out and each step has to be done carefully and precisely. The result of this time-consuming work is a piece with depth and texture. Please remember that repousse silver jewelry is handmade, no two pieces will ever be the same and will vary slightly from the photographs.

Our Jewelry Warranty:  1. Silver Insanity jewelry is guaranteed against defective craftsmanship, tarnishing, and broken links or studs. 2. We do not replace jewelry due to style preferences, even if the item has been worn.  3. We do not replace jewelry that has been mishandled or damaged by the wearer. This includes but is not limited to: over-adjusting the link, using a high jewelry cleaner, corrosion or tarnishing due to not following the care sheet, or water damage.  4. If you would like to return a product, please contact us for a return number within 30 days of the ship date.  5. Item must be in new and unused condition. No wear and tear.  6. We will replace broken links or broken studs

 [/INST] You can't always judge a book by its cover, but you can certainly add some allure to its pages! This Art Nouveau Sterling Silver Ornate Repousse Heart Bookmark is an exquisite, hand-crafted bookmark for lovers of any age. You'll have no problem remembering your place in the story with this gorgeous heart-shaped bookmark.

The bookmark is crafted using the art of repousse (a technique that uses metal pounding to inflate the metal, making this bookmark truly three-dimensional) from sterling silver. The Art Nouveau style features ornate leaves and curling flowers, complete with swirls and gorgeous curling vines. The heart is the accent piece, which will remind you of a love story at every turn. Each bookmark is made by hand and will have some minor variations from the photo. This bookmark is not only functional, but it also makes a beautiful piece of jewelry to wear with your outfit.

We carefully select our suppliers to ensure that we only sell items of the highest quality. Every item is handcrafted using traditional techniques for a unique one-of-a-kind piece. Each piece of jewelry is 925 Sterling Silver, which is the standard designation for sterling silver that is guaranteed to not contain any other metal. This is the highest standard for Sterling Silver, which means it is of the utmost quality. Our Sterling Silver jewelry will not tarnish or change color, and it does not contain any harmful elements such as nickel.

Each piece of jewelry is beautifully packaged by Silver Insanity in a gift box to make giving or receiving easy and special. We know you will love this heart bookmark as much as we do!

This handcrafted sterling silver repousse bookmark features leaves with wavy edges, intricately engraved patterns and a teardrop swirl design in the center of the heart. Repousse art dates back to the ancient Greeks and Egyptians. To create this heart bookmark, an artisan first models the design in wax on copper, then the copper and wax is used to create a mold, which is then used to cast the design in sterling silver. The cast silver is then lightly oxidized to highlight details. A protective coating is applied to the finish of this bookmark to prevent tarnishing. Please use a soft cloth to wipe the bookmark, it will develop a patina over time. This bookmark would make a perfect gift for any book lover on your list. This item comes packaged in its own gift box for easy gift giving.

 [/INST] Meet the best sleep shirt you'll ever own. Dream PJ's are the perfect garment for those who experience discomfort in regular nightwear. This is especially true for men and women who have undergone mastectomies, those with lumpectomies, and those who suffer from lymphedema, the removal of nodes in the neck or arm, and breast cancer patients undergoing treatment. It is also ideal for men and women with large hernia's and those who are obese. 
There are a number of nighttime shirts that are designed to provide extra comfort and support, but only one is designed to help regulate excess fluid and relieve discomfort that may occur due to these conditions. That garment is called Dream PJ's. The non-restrictive, seamless sleeveless shirt has a wide range of benefits. It can keep you cool in the summer and warm in the winter, and because of its sleeveless and non-restrictive design, the shirts won't irritate or constrict your arms. The snug shirt also prevents shirts from coming untucked during the night. Dream PJ's come in a wide variety of colors. In the U.S., one in every two people has excess fluid problems. It is also one of the most common problems in industrialized countries. There are many causes of excess fluid, including obesity, hormonal changes during pregnancy and menopause, heart conditions, cancer treatment and heart failure. 
Dream PJ's are the answer for individuals who have swelling in the hands, arms, legs, feet, neck and chest areas. They also help regulate heat and keep you comfortable during extreme temperatures, as well as regulate discomfort from migraines, headaches and menstrual cramps. Best of all, Dream PJ's are designed with comfort in mind. The seamless design of the shirts eliminates the possibility of irritation in the underarm area.  
Make the right choice in sleepwear today. Order your own Dream PJ's today.

 [/INST] BEING A 'DREAMER' IS EASY!Our classic Dream PJs have people all around the world dreaming of more.We've been making these for years and have perfected them! The only material that compares to cotton for comfort and softness, they are breathable, very comfortable and super cute. Our Dream PJs have sleeves so you can still look stylish in public, but once you're home, you're free to kick back and relax in comfort. VERY comfortable and light weight and don't worry, they are super soft when washed and will not lose that softness throughout wearing. Our top seller!A quarter of all garment sales in the US goes to landfills in less than a year, but most clothing is made to last, not to be worn a season or two. After the first few wears, the natural fibers in the cotton start to break down and get so thin you can practically see through it before it falls apart. It's wash after wash the garment falls apart, until eventually you can't wear it anymore.We decided to do something about it. Most garments that end up in landfills were made to last only a little while, but if they were made to last season after season, the demand for cheap, disposable clothing might decrease and the earth might be a little healthier.That's why we made our Dream PJs a CLOSED LOOP garment.We've had people in them for years and they still look great and feel great!Basically, the idea is "reduce, re-use, re-make". After you're done with our Dream PJs, you can always pass them on to a friend. Then, when you need a new pair, pass yours along to someone who might appreciate a re-used garment!Dream PJs also make a great gift!Spend a little extra on quality so your friend can enjoy comfortable Dream PJs all year long!This is our flagship model Dream PJ. Very comfortable and very popular. If you want a fun way to express yourself, this is your Dream PJ. Are you a dreamer?These are available in S, M, L, XL and XXL.  [/INST] Not all Pajamas were created equal. At a basic level, all pajamas feature fabric, design, and some sort of cut or style for the various parts of the body. But that is where things even out. Most pajamas are created by taking fabric (almost always cotton) and cutting it into shapes that cover your parts, sort of like a sewing project, if you will.   That's how most Pajamas get their start. Then there is Dream PJ's. For those of you old enough to remember the 80's TV show "Miami Vice" you may remember the term "Miami Vice" colored apparel.  For those too young to remember "Miami Vice" the idea behind the term "Miami Vice" is clothing that is light, soft, brightly colored, and sexy. That is Dream PJ's in a nutshell.  The PJ's that you will find in this offering are perfect for anyone suffering from Seasonal Affective Disorder or folks who would prefer to stay at home rather than endure the "cold" outside. Suitable for wear at almost any time of the year, Dream PJ's are the ultimate in comfort. Ideal as a lounging garment or even as sleeping attire, these dream machines are made with 100% Unisex cotton and feature the most comfortable Collar, Cuffs, and Waist Band that anyone could ever find.  The Perfect gift for your favorite Human Being.  Stand out at your next company picnic, Neighborhood Block Party, or other social gathering. Also available in Black,  Burgundy,  Black with Black Frame, Black with Gold Frame, Dark Grey, and Cranberry   About Buxton After 25 years, Tom an I are no longer sailing the world, and have returned home to Hood River, Oregon. I'm excited to bring Buxton back to the US! After sailing the world, and living in Hong Kong for 10 years, I realized there was a need for stylish, functional luggage that could be found in a wide range of colors, and I saw an opportunity to make that a reality. Most Buxton bags are available in 9 colors, and all feature our unique burning edge design. Our luggage is handmade with the finest materials available, then individually hand burnished, and hand stitched. The result is luggage that is completely unique. Each piece is individually signed on the inside with the Burnison family signature. Please allow for slight variations in burnishing and color.    We are proud to announce that in 2015 Buxton became a Certified B Corporation. Building a more sustainable future is important to us, and we embrace the tenants of being a Certified B Corp. The Burnison family invite you to experience the difference in a Buxton handbag, backpack, luggage, or messenger bag. We are proud to have been creating iconic luggage for 25 years.   Learn more at buxton-usa.com   Warranty Policy Buxton promises every customer that we will replace any defective tag or handle, and will always offer repairs on site. In the unlikely event that you encounter a problem with a burnished edge, we will repair free of charge! Just return the bag to us, and we'll get you set.    View all Buxton products ¬© 20

Book lovers will appreciate this bookmark's functional design and the romance and allure of the art nouveau repousse process. Bring a bit of the past into the present with this special gift, reminiscent of the hand crafted art of the late 19th and early 20th century.A Repousse artisan uses a metal spoon or tool to hammer the metal from one side, then moves around to the next side to continue the design hammering. This process allows the artist to creatively shape the metal from the inside out. This process is the reason the designs have such intricate details that project out from the metal.One of the earliest art nouveau ornaments, leaf designs featured stylized hearts and flowers with each part harmonizing with the rest. In the hearts and flowers motif, the leaf is often a symbol of spring, renewal and fertility.Product Care:Please be aware that our products are made of a precious metal, and may develop a natural patina over time. This is a natural process that is a testament to the product's authenticity. We recommend that you wear your jewelry carefully, avoiding contact with chemicals and storing it in a protective atmosphere.Hallmarks:925 (for sterling silver) signed by artist"All jewelry that we sell is brand new and guaranteed to be free of defects. The old and intricate technique of repousse is used in the creation of this bookmark. The word repousse means to beat out or push back into shape, and a special metal tool is used to lift the metal to form a raised design. This allows the artist to make raised, three-dimensional designs.  This heart shaped bookmark measures 2&5/8" high and 3/4" wide and has been beautifully crafted from sterling silver; it will make a great gift for any book lover and sits comfortably on the page so it is easy to keep track of your spot as you read.  This wonderful heart bookmark has been oxidized to bring out the detail of the artwork. Please note that oxidization will wear off as it is used and will reveal the silver underneath, this is a natural process and will not affect the strength of the silver.  This bookmark is stunning and comes packaged in a pretty box; would make a wonderful gift for any bookworm.   Item is handcrafted and will vary in details from the photograph.  All jewelry purchased from Silver Insanity comes wrapped in a special box and is packaged with a Certificate of Origin and a Limited Lifetime Warranty.  [/INST] Surround yourself with the beauty and style of art nouveau!  The jewelry of this era (1890-1910) has been faithfully reproduced and inspired by the most renowned artist of that time: Alphonse Mucha. Mucha is best known for his art nouveau posters which featured beautiful young women in flowing, decorative gowns set amidst intricate patterns of flowers, leaves and scrolls. The technique of repousse was widely used in the art nouveau era. This picturesque technique uses a chasing hammer to raise the modelled details of the repousse to the same level as the surrounding metal, so that the surfaces of the piece have no recesses or protrusions. This allows for intricate, detailed designs. The backside of the piece is just as beautiful as the front, offering a mirrored image of the front, with the same details. This bookmark is a 3-dimensional metal relief with a silver finish, measuring approximately 2&5/8" in height and 3/4" wide.  A very unique gift for the book lover in your life or just for yourself! 
Great Gift for:  Women, Teenagers, Men, Book Lovers, People who appreciate the Art Nouveau Style, Antique Enthusiasts, collectors   With a passion for fashion, the designers at Silver Insanity strive to bring you quality sterling silver jewelry that reflects your personal style. From bold and colorful to delicate and understated, Silver Insanity has a wide variety of jewelry to fit your individuality. With a full range of styles to choose from, youll find beautiful gifts for women, men, and children. Each piece of jewelry is expressly designed to bring out the beauty of the precious gems used in the design. The gemstones are carefully selected for their unique look and how well they complement the sterling silver. Whether it is a sterling silver necklace, bracelet, pair of earrings, or ring, you can be assured that you are buying a piece of fine fashion jewelry when you purchase a Silver Insanity product.

 [/INST] You choose an enhanced version of this design, which looks like an original antique silver-plated copper picture frame but is handcrafted in sterling silver, and made larger at your request. It took inspiration from an antique decorative book cover from the Art Nouveau era of the late 19th century. This bookmark, handcrafted in our workshop, is inspired by an Art Nouveau antiqued brass picture frame and ornate base, which is decorated with pretty flowers in round frames. It measures 2 1/8 inches high by 3/4 inches wide and features a floral wreath, intricate embossing, and a magnificent filigree heart. Fitted with a leatherette backing, it is securely attached to a solid ball and measures 3 inches long when extended. This beautiful heart-shaped bookmark, with its pearl-blue background, makes a lovely and unique gift for the book lover in your life. It will make a memorable gift for her as she celebrates her love of writing and literature.  

Art Nouveau began in London in the late 1890s and spread rapidly throughout Europe. Art Nouveau is available today because of the Arts and Crafts Movement in the United Kingdom, which spanned from 1880 to 1910. This highly decorative design was popularized in London coffee shops and later in department stores. Art Nouveau is known for its stylized, flowing lines and sinuous curves, which give a feeling of flow and movement.

 [/INST] Thank you for visiting our shop. We sell a vast range of recycled garments through Amazon, many have been upcyccycled in our own studio.   We are just one of the most ethical sellers in the market place. Our items are recycled from genuine commercial garments with a large focus on both environmentally friendly practices and fair trade. Our suppliers have been rigourously vetted in terms of both their own quality standards and their CSR practices.  We understand and respect the ILO (International Labor Office) definitions of forced, bonded, conscripted, quarantined, or indentured labor as well as slave labor.   It is our core belief that fair trade practices is an important aspect of a sustainable future for all and we strive to maintain good working relationships with our suppliers.  These garments are not generic "upcycled" goods, we hold our suppliers to an incredibly high standard. If we were unhappy with the quality, we would not sell the items.   The garments are made from a blend of the original garment with a strong cotton. Most Dream PJ's have a super loose fit, but keep in mind the size isnt as important as the feeling!   Every Dream PJ's is totally unique. The original garment that has been upcycled is worn by our staff and photographed so that you can see your own PJs before you purchase them.   If you would like US PS to be your Amazon supplier, please send us a message.  Please see the feedback from our customers.   All garments are washed 3 times before they are listed to ensure that any initial stiffness has been worn out.  We look forward to your purchase.   Please note that due to our genuine commitment to fair trade practices, all of our suppliers are based in the USA and we have no tolerance for counterfeiting.   Please be aware that the logo on the item might differ from the picture, please take a close look at the description of the item, if the logo is not specified, we will ship the item with the logo that is available.  [/INST] Why are Dream PJ's the comfiest PJ's around?  1. We believe that you have the right to the best PJ's on the planet so that you can reclaim your sleeping hours from insomnia and all it's related ailments.  2. We don't think that pajamas should cause you to sweat. We know that the fabric can be both soft and breathable.  3. We know that you want to look good in your PJ's even if you are wearing them at 3am. It's not rocket science.  4. And finally, we have fashion sensibilities that are colorful and chic.   Please try one of our styles. We think you will love them. Please buy a pair for yourself and a pair for a friend. Thanks in advance for supporting a company with a social mission. Most of our products are manufactured in a socially responsible environment (i.e., not sweat shops). Women earning fair wages are the primary source of our profits. Every time you purchase from Ethical Spot, we contribute to the reforestation of the Amazonian Rain Forest through our Green Forest Project. Also, we are here to help you reclaim your sleep. Please contact us with any questions you may have.    Quality and Safety Guarantee   Our fabrics are oeko-tex certified so they are free of heavy metals like lead, mercury, and arsenic. They are also free of phtalates and other harmful chemicals. Our fabrics are breathable and soft. Most of our styles are available in size S/M, L/XL and XXL/XXXL and a few styles are available up to 4X.  Please order from a reputable seller as we have no control over the seller's policies. We have an automatic replacement program where if you purchase a print item and it is defective, just let us know and we will replace it with a new one.   Finally, if you are not completely satisfied, send the item back for a full refund. We always welcome new comments.  Feel free to Contact Us if you have any questions at all.

Silver is very hard and is easily molded into beautiful shapes. To keep your silver jewelry looking its best, it is important to avoid contact with chlorine, ammonia, bleach, and any strong acid or alkali. We encourage you to use jewelry cleaners to clean your silver jewelry. Brush the silver jewelry with a soft brush, and apply silver polish to the silver jewelry and then rinse with warm water. Clean your jewelry regularly to ensure it will not tarnish.

What is Sterling Silver? Sterling silver is an alloy containing 92.5% pure silver and the balance is normally other metals such as copper. It has a bright white silver appearance and is very resistant to tarnish. The addition of copper gives silver a more compact structure and helps to prevent scratching and tarnishing. The use of sterling silver for jewelry has been around for thousands of years and is a popular choice for all types of jewelry. About Gem Avenue
We have been in the jewelry business for 25 years, selling jewelry and gemstones all over the world. Gem Avenue was established in 1995 in Santa Barbara, CA by Scott Fandel and has been in the same family ever since. In 2016, David Fandel took over operations for the company. We are committed to providing you with the best customer service as we have always done for the past 25 years.
Gemstone History
In 1902, the famous gemstone cutter, Marcel Tolkowsky, found a way to cut diamonds so they would have 58 facets instead of 50. Thus, emerged the emerald cut. This cut was originally used for diamonds but has now been replicated to many other stones. We now have the ability to enhance a stones clarity, color and brilliance through cut. An emerald cut gives the ring a fresh, vibrant, eye-catching look.

Our last two designs are written in the english language, Agape is the first, and ADORE is our last ring on this page. Agape is Greek for unconditional love. Agape is a word you will often see used in the bible, in reference to God's love and His desire for us. Many Christians will write this word on their jewelry.  For more information on our ring sizes please see our other products. If you are unsure of your ring size. Please see a professional jeweler. We also have our rings in sizes 12, 13 and 14, which are not shown on our main photo. For more information, please send us a message.   
To ensure the ring you choose will fit properly, it is important that you know your finger size. This can be done at home.  First, take a string or paper and wrap it around the base of your finger. Then wrap it around the end of the string. The length of the string between the two points of the wrap will give you your measurement. Measure that length of string in millimeters on a ruler and that is your ring size.   
Please remember, in jewelry many times the width of a ring is not the same as the size. Depending on the metal weight of the ring, one width may have a smaller size than the other. For example, two rings of the same width may have different sizes depending on the weight of the metal. The weight of the metal in rings depends on the width, therefore if two rings are the same width, one ring may have more metal than the other. Then when using a ring sizer to determine your size you may find that one of the rings will fit on the tip of your finger with the sizer, while the other will not fit. What makes Diamond Simulants so special? Diamond simulants are incredibly brilliant and very durable. They have exceptional fire, brilliance and scintillation (sparkle). Diamond simulants are shiny and sparkly and the nearest thing to a natural diamond.

 [/INST] This is a solid sterling silver marquise cut cubic zirconia ring. The sterling silver ring is silver plated. The marquise cut is the second most popular cut after the round cut. A marquise cut is an elongated heart shape cut, with pointed ends and the widest part of the crown. The center is flat and the sides are angled. It is known as a "marquise" cut due to the Marquise of Pompadour, one of its earliest wearers. This cut was invented in 1400s by the French gem cutter and jeweler, Marcel Rameau. The Marquise cut is traditionally set in prongs, which makes it seem larger than it actually is. This piece is sterling silver with a high polish finish. This ring has a high-quality CZ stone. CZ stones are stunning, long lasting, very affordable and conflict-free.Cubic Zirconia (CZ) is a diamond substitute made of zirconium oxide and is grown in a laboratory. CZ is the best way to achieve that "diamond look" without paying diamond prices. Zirconium is the base metal that CZ is grown on. The word "Cubic Zirconia" means the material is both cubic in crystalline structure and zirconia (zircon), oxide. The CZ stone has lots of sparkle and makes the ring shine and catch the light. Our stones are 18%light transmissibility, with an average dispersion of 8.5% (a measure of the amount of light that is broken up into its component colors). Our stones are set in a 5 prong mount. The ring has a high polish finish. This ring is handmade and measures 13.8mm wide. The stones is 8mm in diameter. FREE SHIPPING on all orders in the continental U.S. Our priority is providing exceptional customer service. If you have any questions or concerns, just let us know and we will do everything we can to make you a satisfied customer.We inspect each product carefully before shipping. If you receive a defective product, please contact us and we will correct the problem, no questions asked.

 [/INST] Hats with cotton twill hat bands, set in cotton felt. Different sizes and colors available.The cotton twill hat band is handsome and classic and these are excellent quality, very economical (8 bands for $11.83).You will make dozens of these hats! The JUST-A-Ribbon hats are sized to fit an average-sized head, but not all hats are the same size. You will probably need to make adjustments to fit all hats, even those in the same size.I hope you find the hat band measurements to be helpful! Use these measurements to make your hats with ribbons youll find patterns in the JUST-A-Ribbon pattern library. Measure the head of the person who will wear the hats.Measure all the way around the head, from the center of the forehead, over the top, and back around the back of the head. This is the measurement that you will need to use to choose the appropriate hat size. For newborns and smaller heads, it may be necessary to measure the widest part of the head. To make these hats, youll need a very narrow (3/8") cotton twill ribbon (sold by the yard at most fabric stores) and a polyester-based felt (also sold by the yard at most fabric stores).If you need help finding the twill ribbon or the felt, a friendly sales associate at your local fabric store should be able to help you. Sometimes, they are available in bulk online. Also, note that cotton twill ribbon will stretch over time, and you may need to use a tool to wind it into a coil. You will need a needle that is long enough to reach through the thick felt and the thick ribbon. THIS KIT INCLUDES: Enough 3/8" cotton twill ribbon to make 8 hat bands (the measure of a hat band is 8 1/2"). That's enough to make 8 hats, with more for practice. Enough white felt to make 8 hats. Youll also need scissors and a needle (with a large enough eye to accommodate the ribbon).

Tailored with double-stitch seams throughout, double v-shaped western yoke back and matching western chest patch pockets, slash hand warmer pockets and adjustable button tab waist. Trimmed throughout with Schaefer's signature two-piece die cast solid brass logo buttons. Extra roomy, prewashed for comfort and truer fit. 100% cotton. Machine washable. Made in USA."]

 [/INST] As the first-ever dedicated division of Western Identity, Schaefer Outfitters was created in 1996 to focus on manufacturing the best western work and recreational wear available. Schaefer's factories and the workers who work them have been personally selected and inspected to ensure we meet all manufacturing standards for the United States. We bring over 20 years of western work wear manufacturing experience to the table, creating superb products for men and women who work hard, and play even harder. Because of our reputation as a work wear manufacturer and our parent company's large scale, we're able to use only the best materials available in the industry, including worry-free, generous sizing fabrics that wash and hold up great. We offer a full line of western work and casual shirts, western work and recreational pants, western belts, western hats, and accessories. Our work clothing has been tested in the trenches of the cow-punching, hay-fielding, all-weather, everyday adventures. And we're proud to say that our work clothes are tough enough to take it, and tough enough to keep you comfortable all day! Our full line of western work clothing, western work gloves, western belts, western hats, western scarves, and western neckwear is designed to last. So go ahead and kick up your heels. Better yet, kick up some dirt. Our western clothing is built to take it. And so are you.

Schaefer Outfitters Legend Denim Jacket [Please Select an Option]The Schaefer Outfitters Legend Denim Jacket was crafted with the same time-tested specifications, colors, and materials used in Schaefer's original 1927 Design. This denim jacket has a workmanship and quality rarely found today. All of the brass buttons, the cording on the collar, the pockets, and the labeling with the same vintage style are of the highest quality. It is a blend of comfortable 100% 14 oz. heavyweight vintage denim and natural cotton. Features:100% Cotton / 100% Denim Manufactured in USA / Made in Mexico Classic vintage indigo blue color with all brass buttons and trimmings YKK brass zippers in buttons Saddle stitched seams with vintage brass thread Ribcage Corded collar Two front patch pockets, two buttoned lower pleat pockets and two inside snap buttoned pockets Action pleat on back Paint splash pockets on the interior 12 inches long sleeves and 24 inch length Vented side seam slits These are a little larger than our fitting standard U.S. sizes, so please size down. Note that the shrinkage rate is minimal on these jackets (5% max). There is an additional $5.00 per jacket handling charge for any adjustments. If you would like us to adjust the jacket, please send us a message after placing the order. Please do not order any other item in the same order as we will not be able to combine orders.

 [/INST] Schaefer Outfitters Legend Denim Jacket! An insanely comfortable denim jacket that features a 100% Washed Cotton Sateen Interior, Stainless Steel buttons, hand crafted celtic embroidery with red fiber fill, and a true classic look! Fits and Feels like your favorite denim jacket. The Legend line offers you a solid foundational piece for your wardrobe that will last for decades. Truly Superior Construction at an affordable price. Soft and comfortable like your favorite old denim jacket that gets better with age. You'll love how the stainless steel buttons contrast with the embroidered accents. We've had the same designs in our possession since the early days. The silky smooth celtic knotwork embroidery is paired with raised red fiber fill to give the jacket dimension. Our embroidery really pops against the beautiful 100% washed cotton interior. Inspired by our military heritage and tested by our Junction boys and special ops.
About Schaefer Outfitters: The clothing at Schaefer Outfitters is built with soldiers, bikers, cowboys, and everyone else who loves the outdoors in mind. This brand was built on military values and continues to outfit the armed forces and civilians all over the world with outdoor adventure wear and military uniforms. It's no coincidence that the brand is widely used in the special operations community. It was the vision of the Junction Boys to create apparel that blends the durable function of military boots with the comfort of your favorite jeans. They wanted apparel to be made with durable fabric, fluffy insulation, and tough construction while retaining comfort and function. These are the qualities that have defined the development of Schaefer Outfitters as a premier brand in the outdoor apparel industry. Schaefer Outfitters is a veteran-owned business and supports military, law enforcement, and first responders with exclusive discounts. All Schaefer Outfitters' products are backed by their industry leading no-questions-asked 30-day returns and company warranty.

 [/INST] Few brands are as closely tied to Americas rugged outdoors heritage as Schaefer Outfitters. It is our life to adventure and our passion to create quality clothing that endures the test of time. Beginning in 1971 with our original suspender design, Schaefer Outfitters has grown into a leading manufacturer of quality clothing and accessories. Every Schaefer product is built from the finest materials and designed to provide years of service. Schaefer Legend Denim is a 12oz (4way stretch) selvedge denim jacket with the same size, pocket placement, and fits as the classic Levi's 501. It is distressed in-house to reveal the hidden stitching and comes with classic indigo warp dye contrast stitching. The reflective pocket trim reflects red when lit up from behind. It has a two-way welt back pleat, false front pockets, and branded snaps. This is the perfect addition to your wardrobe, look in the Schaefer archives and get inspired!

 [/INST] Fusing cutting edge fashion with a classic vintage appeal, our Legend Jean is the perfect union of two worlds. Featuring a classic denim construction and button up plackets at the cuffs and neck, this jacket has a true Levi's feel to it. But the Legend doesn't stop there. Its genuine seoled deer skin leather sleeve accents, bold black/silver twist snap buttons and hardware, subtle rock-n-roll-inspired accents at the shoulder, and form fitting silhouette, the Legend Jean Jacket is a must have for any true Schaefer fanatic.

The Schaefer Outfitters Legend Jean has all the classic features you'd expect in a denim jacket with the high quality construction and detail that only Schaefer can provide. Each of these 100% imported jackets is individually handcrafted and cared for, inspected for quality and overall finish before being shipped to us for shipment to you.

Bold enough to wear in a business meeting yet rugged enough to sport through the wilderness, the Schaefer Outfitters Legend Jean Jacket is the classic garment for any occasion.

-100% Imported Material
-Genuine Deer skin leather Accents
-Dry-to-touch rubberized paint
-Classic Denim Construction
-Buttoned cuffs
-Buttoned Neck
-Form Fitting silhouette
-High quality, fine gauge Denim
-Silver and black twist-snap buttons and Hardware
-Inspired by Rock-N-Roll and fashioned with Motorcycle influence.

 [/INST] Launched in 2001, the Schaefer Outfitters collection is based on generations of craftsmanship by family owned and operated factories in Peru. Today, we are the largest source of denim in the world and have a factory producing fine washed denim. We produce our washed denim from 8 to 34 lengths. We produce all finishes, including the famous "Schaefer" wash. We produce stretch and non-stretch products, in 100% and 80/20 blends. We have all styles, from single and straight cuts to pre-ruptured, ripped and distressed khakis. We are the home of all terrain khakis ¬Æ, featuring our exclusive polyester mesh linings. Khaki's are our business. Our khakis fit your lifestyle. The Legend is a traditional denim jacket. This iconic item was released in our first catalog and is still one of our best sellers. The Legend is a classic Western style jacket, featuring star logo rivets on the collar and front pockets. The Legend has handcut accent stitching, double stitched hem and seams, quadruple stitched latched sleeves, and a trademark tie in the neck. The Legend features S flat-backed button closures, lining made out of polyester and 71% cotton 29% polyester. It is Shop the collection and you'll quickly see why Schaefer Outfitters is your favorite destination for the world's finest denim. We've been in business for over 45 years selling from our website to many upscale retailers around the world. We sell many brands but Schaefer Outfitters is the strongest. Men who wear our khakis feel like they've returned home when they buy and wear Schaefer. We thank you! for your interest in our products. ]

 [/INST] The Ranger Vest is a new take on a classic hunting and shooting vest that combines comfort with functionality. This vest features an open face design and is built with the hunter in mind.  The front and back pockets are vertical, which allows for a wider variety of gear to be stored. The pockets feature a top and bottom zipper entry, allowing you to easily access and organize your gear on the fly. The front and back pockets are also designed to be used with or without packs, for maximum versatility. The Ranger Vest is designed to hold and transport plenty of gear but is still very lightweight and comfortable to wear. The vest features two zippered ammo pockets and a large flip-out game bag, making it the perfect choice for your hunting gear. The Ranger Vest has double-shoulder straps and is made from high-quality Cordura Nylon. It comes in three standard colors, including RealTree Camo and Mossy Oak Bottomland Camo.  
The Ranger Vest is also available in a Belted Version that has an extra set of belt loops sewn into the back of the vest.  
SCHAEFER OUTFITERS was established in 1981. The Schaefer Outfitters company philosophy has remained the same over the years: To give our customers the highest quality gear at a reasonable price. At Schaefer Outfitters, we take pride in the gear we sell and back it with a 100% satisfaction guaranteed.

Over time, that passion has grown into a culture of exploration and adventure. At Schaefer, they believe in the transformative power of time spent outdoors. The thrill of the unknown, the rush of discovery, and the sense of accomplishment that comes with pushing your limits. It is these emotions that fuel their desire to inspire people to explore and to share the experience of the outdoors. They believe that it is through these experiences that we grow stronger and become better versions of ourselves. The Schaefer Outfitters product line was designed to support your needs in the outdoors with products that are durable, functional, and comfortable. At the core of these products is a philosophy of minimalism, quality and an understanding that functionality and fashion can coexist.**

The Ranger is the quintessential hiking pack. Based on the popular Canyoneer, this pack features a 15-15-15 (height x capacity x volume) capacity. A simple, functional design, it has 32 adjustable pockets and clamps for attaching gear, which are designed to allow for optimal packing and organization. The Ranger is perfect for day packs or multi-day hikes. The Ranger Vest also comes in four colors and fits small, medium, large, and extra-large, making it available for anyone.  A true classic, the Ranger Vest is the perfect item for anyone who needs that added flexibility and versatility to their wardrobe. The Ranger Vest is ideal for any outdoor or casual occasion.  
The Schaefer Outfitters Ranger Vest is available in sizes Small through 3X-Large. For optimal fit, please refer to the size chart. For any order issue, please contact us to resolve it quickly.  At Schaefer Outfitters, we take great pride in our company's rich heritage and tradition. Since 1881, Schaefer has designed innovative clothing and footwear that challenges the status quo and pushes the boundaries of design and functionality. Today, Schaefer Outfitters continues to develop top-quality outdoor apparel for people who want quality without compromise.

HYGIENIC BUTTON HOLES: The Schaefer Outfitters Ranger Vest has hygienic button holes, in case you forget to do laundry before your trip.  BINOCULAR ARM: The Ranger Vest has an extra long arm to accommodate binos. The arm is made with a flexible rubber coating to protect your lenses from scratching and the binocular strap is made with webbing to keep them securely in place.  [/INST] 

For over 40 years, Schaefer Outfitters has crafted functional clothing with an eye towards the practical needs of hunters, outdoorsmen, and law enforcement professionals. This commitment to making top-quality, hunting gear has made us who we are today, and we remain committed to delivering superior clothing that looks good on the trail and on the job.With its durable construction and feature-rich design, the Ranger Vest is a versatile piece of hunting gear that's made to work as hard as you do. Crafted with 100-denier 100% nylon ripstop, this hunting vest is built to last, and its array of features will keep you comfortable, protected, and well-equipped on your next hunt. 
The Ranger Vest offers a wide range of storage options to keep all of your gear within easy reach, including two large game pockets with a side-loading zipper, a small pocket with a plastic-covered zipper, and several elastic bandoleer-style holders for attaching hunting accessories, shells, or extra ammunition. Additional features include a large flap that opens up into a pass-through pocket, a self-draining game pocket, and a web belt with two quick-release buckles and a stretch polyester waistband. Together, these features make this vest one of the most functional and feature-rich vests on the market. 
A true American hunting classic, this vest is available in Schaefer Outfitters' popular Khaki color and offers a versatile, comfortable, and very wearable fit. With its durable and high-quality construction, and array of feature-rich storage options, the Ranger Vest is a top pick for any hunter who needs a vest that works. Simple, functional, durable, and classic, the Ranger Vest is a staple for any serious hunter.
Product Dimensions:\n                    \n6 x 6 x 1 inches
Shipping Weight:\n                    \n16 ounces (View shipping rates and policies)

  - Shipping Information:
                    
View shipping rates and policies

 [/INST] Toughest hunting, outdoor, and fishing gear on the planetAt Schaefer Outfitters, our highest priority is to provide you with the best hunting, fishing, and outdoor gear that you can trust to keep you safe and comfortable outdoors. Our years of experience and commitment to innovation and quality have earned us a reputation for producing some of the toughest outdoor gear available anywhere in the world. We cant wait to see what youre hunting and where youll go next. A stalwart packThe Schaefer Outfitters Ranger Vest is a true classic. Its a tough, reliable, and comfortable pack for hauling gear in the backcountry. Whether you're hunting bears in the Rockies, backpacking the Appalachian Trail, or fishing in the High Country, the Ranger is the pack that you can count on to carry you and your gear with ease. Its built for the toughest hunting and outdoor excursions, and yet is light enough for more casual hikes as well. The 642 cubic inch capacity allows you to haul all of the gear you need to explore the great outdoors. Compact, easy to carryThe Ranger Vest features a lightweight suspension system and a compact packed size, with a full-coverage rain cover that cinches tightly around the pack with quick-release shoulder straps. The pack features a durable water-repellent finish that protects your gear from the elements, while a mesh back panel provides ventilation to keep you cool and dry. The Ranger Vest is available in the following colors and dimensions: Olive Green / 23" x 11" x 11" (Fits up to 642 cu. in.), Mossy Oak Break-Up Country / 23" x 11" x 11" (Fits up to 642 cu. in.), Realtree Xtra Green Camo / 23" x 11" x 11" (Fits up to 642 cu. in.), Shadow Grey / 23" x 11" x 11" (Fits up to 642 cu. in.), Highland Camo / 23" x 11" x 11

 [/INST] Weve added just enough bells and whistles to our classic Ranger Vest to create a versatile and modular, yet very wallet-friendly, hunting vest. With its slim profile, youll be amazed at how comfortable and light this vest is. The adjustable torso length closure and bendable Q: Down bow clip can be easily adjusted on the fly. Features a large game pocket that can hold a lot of gear, yet folds up for a streamlined look when not in use. Includes 15 "Jumper" pockets on both front and back that expand to hold plenty of accessories, shells, or eggs, and can be folded up to carry less for a slimmed down look. 100% Nylon with Polyester mesh. Double stitched seams. HydroMAX treatment. Imported. SIZING: The Ranger is a cut-to-fit style vest. To ensure a proper fit, please refer to the Size Charts in the product picture above. For the Classic Fit (not shown):  Cut to Fit - Measure around fullest part of chest just under armpit blubber. For the Modified Fit (not shown):  Cut to Fit - Measure around fullest part of chest just under armpit blubber. Round to nearest inch up.

title: Stockman Vest
description: ["Every now and then a vest comes along that's so versatile, it becomes your favorite. The Stockman does just that... designed to be worn proudly as a single layer or as a valued layer of warmth. The shell is constructed from genuine Canadian Melton Wool, 24 oz. strong and lined with premium grade taffeta. Distinctly western with its hard-tailored Whiskey NuBuck trim featured on the front pocket welts and western back yok piping. Buttons are fine, however quick release solid brass logo belt lin for warth and overall comfort and mobility. Made in USA."]

Our version of a traditional Hunting Stockman's Vest is hand-crafted with a No-Slip Satin polyester lining. The interior bi-directional cloth shell is 100% wool and gives a more traditional look and feel. This vest is made in a traditional stockman's diamond shape and is a pull-on item. Please be aware that this vest will run a little larger than our other vests, so we recommend ordering a size down.The chest size on our Vest is sized differently than our Hunting Vests, so please make sure to pay attention to the overall measurement. The drop down measurements are general guidelines, and can be easily adjusted to your liking. Size differences are also listed below to assist you in choosing the proper size. When ordering a Vest, there are two options: Flat Back and Rocker Bottom. Please note, Flat Back Vests will allow the Vest to lay smoothly on your chest, while Rocker Bottom Vests have the pockets on the outskirts of the vest, giving a more traditional Stockman's Vest look. These options are selectable in the pull down menu. All Vests come standard with a double snap with strap to attach to our Holster Sheaths, making for a quick and secure vest and sheath combination.

In 1972, Herb Schaefer founded the Schaefer Outfitters Company, beginning with the same gear his own grandfather had made for him to wear while re-enacting the Old West. The gear was handmade to the finest standards: classic cowboy style, with the right tools for successful hunters and cowboys.
Now in its third generation, Schaefer Outfitters Company makes gear for a new generation of enthusiasts with the same standards and enthusiasm they started with, and dedicated to preserving the solid traditions and spirit of the Old West.
A new approach for a new time, Schaefer Outfitters makes gear to bring the West home to the city slicker and country boy alike. From rodeo to ranch and city to country, Schaefer Outfitters is there, offering the right gear for people who still live life the Western way.

Schaefer Outfitters. The gear youve always wanted. The quality you always expect.

 [/INST] The Stockman Vest is a quality crafted vest with an adjustable chest size, loose fit, and pocket for various types of equipment. This vest is 100% calfskin, soft, flexible, and durable. The exterior is 5mm thick and lined with corduroy for added comfort. The 11-inch long vest zips closed with a large brass zipper. This vest is a wonderful addition to your Western wardrobe and makes for a great gift!

Avendra Stockman is the original manufacturer of this vest, which has been reproduced by Schaefer, Cowboy Classics, and Western Heritage. The Avendra vest has also been reproduced under the following brands: Roper, Bob Cooney, Hinrichs, Empress, Reproduction, Marlboro, C.R.L., Columbia, Texarkana, and 3M's. Avendra vest are still being manufactured by Avendra under their line of vests called Avendra Stockman Vest.

We have been in business for over 75 years. Our expertise in sheepskin and cowhide products is unmatched by any competitor. Our collection consists of sheepskin, lambskin, and cowhide caps, mittens, gloves, gauntlets, belts, bags, sporting goods, and hats. We are proud to say we still make these items by hand, in the USA. The vests are made in India, but they are created and designed in the USA. Our materials are tanned to our specifications, then sent to India to be hand cut and assembled by the most skilled craftsmen. Then, we finish the vest with brass hardware, carefully check the vest to ensure quality, and then packed and shipped to our customers. Please remember that our products are hand crafted and therefore will have slight variations in construction and appearance.

 [/INST] It was hot and the sun beat down on me. Not a cloud was in the sky. The Bighorn Mountains loomed over me with the snow capped peaks glistening in the distance. Although the temperatures were in the low 80's, on top of those peaks, the temperature was sure to be in the 40's with a strong wind blowing. These were the perfect conditions for our Western Hunting Trek.  We were 8 guys who had all been friends since high school, which was 25 years ago. We made the trek up to the top of one of the peaks and began our search for the elusive mountain goat. We had spotted one earlier in the day, but it had eluded us and we were determined to find and harvest one before the end of the day.  We sat down in the shade to rest our weary legs and wait for the goat to come to us. It was a rough terrain to traverse and the rocky terrain made every step a strenuous task. Finally, it happened. A magnificent male appeared over the top of the ridge. His beard was fully grown and he was sporting an impressive set of horns. We were all excited as we slowly and carefully made our way down the mountain to the waiting truck. It was then that I noticed that my pockets were not where I had left them. I was frantically searching through my vest, but it wasn't there. That's when I realized that I must have removed it during our descent down the mountain.  I felt a sinking sensation in my stomach. There was no way I was going to find that vest in this terrain. I reluctantly told the rest of the group and we all began searching, to no avail.  The vest had been a birthday gift to me by my wife, purchased from Schaefer Outfitters. It was a Stockman Vest by Cabelas, featuring tough 840 Denier Cordura nylon with a water-resistant finish. The bottom half of the vest had 3 large bellow game pockets to hold ammunition and other necessities. The front had a large zippered pocket and a snap down center front.  [/INST] From the thick forest to the open prairies, game is abundant in this country. You don't have to be the luckiest fellow in the world to find your game, but you do need a few things to find it; you need the right clothes to wear, the right tools with you, and the right equipment to pack. Stockman's Vest is the one item that every hunter needs. This is an untamed country, but with the Stockman's Vest, you'll be prepared for the rough terrain and the rougher elements of the wilderness. Stockman Vest is 100% cape-code wool to ensure it is tough and durable. It comes in several colors and sizes, and it's hand-made in the USA. Unlike other outdoor manufacturers, Schaefer uses vintage handmade rope for the cord, two pair of snap buttons and outstanding hardware. Stockman's Vest makes you look even tougher! About Schaefer Outfitters: There is no animal that is too challenging for the Schaefer family to hunt, from cape buffalo to prairie dogs, they have been there and have the gear to show it. The Schaefer family has been making top-quality hunting gear since the early 1950s, and this vagabond family travels the globe to find the toughest and largest game. There is no creature on Earth that the Schaefer's haven't taken, from elephant to alligator. They have a great understanding of nature and wild animals, and use this knowledge to make outstanding hunting gear that is truly made in the USA.

 [/INST] The Stockman Vest is crafted from a rich, durable deer hide with a felt lining under the brush pockets, and heavy harness leather at the waist belt. The front is dyed a deep reddish-brown, while the back is colored in a darker shade. This classic workman's vest features five large exterior brush pockets, each with a large button-closure flap and attached drawstring. The stockman's vest was originally designed for ranch workers, with practical features such as large, accessible pockets to hold tools and other necessities, and double-layered leather reinforcement over the heart and lungs, and a sturdy buckle and belt to hold everything securely in place. All of these features are preserved in this superb reproduction, which also includes three inside pockets, a buttoned chest pocket, and two large buttons. The vest closes at the front with five buttons.  [/INST] A Vest That Makes A StatementThe classic Stockman Vest is a utility vest that needs no introduction. Everyone should own a Stockman Vest. The versatility of this front pocketed work/outdoor vest makes it a perfect choice for hunters, fishermen, farmers, outdoor enthusiasts, and everyone who works outside or likes to spend time in the great outdoors.From stitching to quality metal hardware, the Stockman Vest was built to last. Whether you're walking to your blind or simply walking downtown, the Stockman Vest makes a statement about you and your commitment to value and quality.The Stockman Vest is a solid value with its thoughtful design. The stockman side pockets feature the durable double ladder tubular pocket design first introduced on Schaefer's Diamond Ranch Work Shirt. Both pockets feature button closures and are lined with vinyl to keep things dry. Additional pockets include chest pockets that accept our Medium (D) Flashlight Tuck In Tabs and additional gun or game pouches.These vests are 100% cotton outer shell and lining, with quality stainless steel buttons. description: ['Never misplace your readers again, with CliC\'s stylish, magnetic front connection ready readers. CliCs offer you "as needed" access to your glasses. No more granny chains or uncomfortable elastic headbands, and no more fumbling in your purse or briefcase for your glasses. Reach for them hanging around your neck on their size-adjustable band, simply click the magnets together over your nose, and you can read at will. There are 4 unisex, fashion-forward colors: translucent blue, red or clear, and blonde tortise. And each color offers you your choice of 6 different magnification strengths: 1.25 and 1.50 mild strengths, 1.75 and 2.00 medium strengths and 2.50 or 3.00 mature strengths. They also can be fitted for prescription lenses. Easy push/pull adjustment.']
